metadata.title: CVE-2015-1192 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Absolute path traversal vulnerability in kgb 1.0b4 allows remote attackers to write to arbitrary files via a full pathname in a crafted archive.

criterions.comment: kgb package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0b4+ds-14').
